Package utilities Description

package utilities contains 11 utility classes adding specific functionality.
  • About: displays two 'about' dialogs.
  • CompConstrct: constructs all allowed 'Effect' configurations.
  • constructSimulation: calculates the actual simulation.
  • FacetModeView: creates the javaFX views for D-Studies
  • Factor: encapsulates basic nested components that combine to 'Effects'
  • Filer: handles file I/O.
  • Lehmer: creates a pseudo-random signature of synthetic data files, that allows them to be distinguished from empirical data files.
  • Popup: handles exceptions.
  • SampleSizeView: creates special javaFX textfields for collecting sample sizes.
  • VarianceComponent: classifies variance components according to Brennan's Rules.
Author:
Ralph Bloch
